title: What is Mesmerismus® and How Can It Help Develop Human Potential?
first_phrase: This text provides insights into the ancient tradition of magnetic hypnotism, which is updated to the most modern quantum technologies. The previous section of this text discusses the importance of focusing on the doer rather than on the done, and the consequences of this in various contexts such as organizations, therapy, and personal growth. Moreover, the text highlights the two fundamental ways for the development of the person: path A and path B, and how this system of magnetic hypnotism is suitable for deep processing in all domains of life. The last 200 tokens present a general outline of the formation and paths in magnetic hypnotism, ranging from the initial steps to becoming a master in the field.
content: It is true that persuasion and healing habilities will be greatly enhanced, and it is also true that in our discipline a key point is the operator that must become a true Master. Traditionally, from the most ancient times there were three steps a person must do to get to the top and really be a Master: Step 1 – getting rid of unnecessary thoughts and needs. The level 1 is preliminary and can be done with various methods. It consists in the awareness of the existence of the basis states and in overcoming all the obstacles that may exist in order to begin to access to level 2. In practice, the participant solves all its states of stress baseline. Ordinary man’s mind is full of a cloud of thinking and of want. First step needs a person create a clear mind - the ancient alchemists called it making the salt cristal clear. It means a mind no more cluttered by the encrusting of habits and a different relationship with the body where we live in the body. Step 2 – grasping the first level quantum view of reality. At level 2 the participant expands the basics and become better able to master the external activators to expand its awareness. He experiences the natural series basis of some deep states of consciousness and can already start with the first steps of growth thereafter. Such states are important as well as for individual development, and also are of great importance in the therapy and are the basis of the model of long-term change permanent. In this level we understand that we are part of the same universe we are observing.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the International Network for Knowledge Euro-Asian Academic Network, Research in Higher Practical Mental Sciences, Neurosciences, Tibetan Mysticism, Scientific Hypnosis, Western and Oriental Esoteric Paths of Power and Therapy, offers a comprehensive curriculum aimed to help researchers and students achieve the highest levels of mastery.
